review: The fire stick is easy to use.  There are a lot of options with all the games, movies, tv shows, etc.  The negatives are that a lot of the tv shows and movies are Pay Per View so that would quickly bring the $99/year you pay for Amazon Prime up.  We couldn't figure out how to use it on a different tv so I'm not sure that's possible.  Also, there was so much buffering that we cancelled it during our free trial.
author: Tammy Cachat

review: Have played 2 movies thru Amazon Prime and both worked ok except when I wanted to fast forward or rewind I got this awful noise thru the sound.  What would cause this?
author: Richard V.

review: The only reason I bought this is, because of the sad fact that it was the only way I can watch Amazon video on TV with subtitles and guess what? FireTV Stick break again and again, it won't work again after a week. I'm sick and tired of it.Network disconnections, constantly rebooting, glitchy video playing, and so much more.

review: Had issues getting it set up. Was told by tech it wasn't designed for a RCA they were wrong would be 5 stars if it wasn't for the tech support department
author: ALbert Nadeau

review: I use amazon on a daily and ordering the firestick for my TV was the best choice I've made. I used to have to plug up my computer and that was getting to be a pain. Just plug the firestick in and go. Set up was really easy, and they had a short video to explain the things you could do. Now my movies, tv shows, music, and games are all at the control of a remote!
author: Amazon Customer
